insert into ORDERINFO (ORDERID, USERID, ORDERDATE, RECEIPTKEY, RECEIPTADDR, RECEIPTLATI, RECEIPTLONG, CARID, TOTALPRICE) select ORDER_SEQ.NEXTVAL AS orderid, #{userid}, sysdate, #{receiptkey}, #{receiptaddr}, #{receiptlati}, #{receiptlong}, #{carid}, #{totalprice} FROM DUAL
select ORDER_SEQ.CURRVAL AS orderid FROM DUAL
insert into orderdetail (orderid, prodid, prodnm, prodprice, ordercnt) select #{orderid}, #{prodid}, #{prodnm}, #{prodprice}, #{ordercnt} from orderdetail d, orderinfo i where d.orderid = i.orderid
